api_description: meobeo.ai is an AI-powered assistant for automatic meeting note-taking and summarization. It captures key discussions, analyzes important information, and generates meeting minutes efficiently, helping users save time and enhance productivity.
failed_to_download_file: Failed to download file from the provided URL.
checksum_invalid: Checksum is invalid. File may have been corrupted or tampered with.
error_analyzing_cv: An error occurred while analyzing the CV.
no_text_extracted: No text could be extracted from the provided CV.
unsupported_cv_file_type: The provided CV file type is not supported. Please upload a PDF, DOCX, or TXT file.
error_initializing_qdrant_client: Error initializing Qdrant vector database client.
empty_file_content: The uploaded file is empty or contains no extractable text content.
error_adding_document_to_vector_store: Error adding document to the vector store.
error_creating_or_checking_collection: Error creating or checking the knowledge base collection.
error_deleting_document: Error deleting document from the knowledge base.
error_listing_documents: Error listing documents from the knowledge base.
error_retrieving_document: Error retrieving document from the knowledge base.
unsupported_file_type: Unsupported file type. Please upload PDF, TXT, or MD files.
error_generating_questions: An error occurred while generating questions.
error_connecting_knowledge_base: Could not connect to the knowledge base.
error_in_self_reflection: An error occurred during the self-reflection process.
error_fetching_rag_knowledge: Failed to fetch knowledge from RAG system.
error_generating_initial_questions: Failed to generate initial set of questions.
error_in_self_reflection_resulted_empty: Self-reflection process resulted in no questions.
error_no_questions_selected: No critical questions were selected after processing.
error_unexpected_question_generation: An unexpected error occurred during question generation.
error_missing_user_characteristics: User characteristics are required to compose questions.
error_no_questions_composed: Failed to compose any questions. The composition process did not yield results.
error_unexpected_question_composition: An unexpected error occurred during question composition.
error_rag_connection: Failed to connect to or retrieve data from the knowledge base (RAG system).
info_querying_knowledge_base: Querying knowledge base for relevant context...
error_knowledge_query_failed: Failed to prepare a query for the knowledge base.
error_knowledge_base_query_failed: Failed to retrieve context from the knowledge base.
error_self_reflection_step_failed: A step in the self-reflection process failed.
error_composer_graph_execution: An error occurred while executing the question composer graph.
